org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.game
Interface GameSolver<T extends Strategy<?>>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of winning strategy
All Superinterfaces:
Algorithm, AlgorithmListener, java.util.EventListener
All Known Subinterfaces:
ControllableGameSolver<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractControllableGameSolver, AbstractGameSolver, BigStepSolver, ClassicalBuchiSolver, DeadEndSolver, DominionDecompositionSolver, GlobalOptimizationSolver, McNaughtonZielonkaSolver, ReachabilitySolver, RecursiveSolver, SmallProgressMeasureSolver
public interface GameSolver<T extends Strategy<?>>
extends Algorithm

This interfaces defines game solvers.

Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai
